channel.title: Compile + Make online client
channel.description:
Hello, I hope you can help me compile my server. My source is Vicoscape. I've not known how to compile it, And i got my friend to but i dont think he done it right because i get errors. I have an Index file with the folowing contents
DHGaming webclient
I have uploaded all of the client files downloaded from Vicoscape into the same folder on host and i get this error http://dhgaming.com/client/ [ for those who dont want to load] Sorry, An error has occured whilst loading Vicoscape Client. To fix this try the folowing [in order]: 1 update your java at : Java.com 2 get java JDK google it! 3. Try to change the titlescreen, in sprites/vicoscape.png 4. Remember the pic must be .png 5. i dont know anymore . . . If you woldent mind, giving me a step by step help please i would really apricate it, Please dont tell me to do this do that because im not a Java expert what so ever, if you would like to talk over msn add html3333@hotmail.com Thankyou

item.title: Compile + Make online client

item.description:
@html33 wrote:

Okay, Well if a mod doesent mind moving it for me please.

I do mean for RS not RSC[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2008, 10:19:54 am[/size][hr]b u m p . . .

wrong section, this is RSC that is RS2

and if it was rsc, i dont think ppl would help with webclient, since none at the moment have it(that i know of, could be wrong)

item.title: Compile + Make online client
item.dc:creator: @html33 html33
item.description:
@html33 wrote:

Hello, I hope you can help me compile my server.

My source is Vicoscape.

I’ve not known how to compile it, And i got my friend to but i dont think he done it right because i get errors.

I have an Index file with the folowing contents

DHGaming webclient <applet name=Vicoscape_Client_7.0.jar" code="client" archive="Vicoscape_Client_7.0.jar" height="503"

width=“765”>

I have uploaded all of the client files downloaded from Vicoscape into the same folder on host and i get this error

http://dhgaming.com/client/ [ for those who dont want to load]

Sorry, An error has occured whilst loading Vicoscape Client.

To fix this try the folowing [in order]:

1 update your java at : Java.com
2 get java JDK google it!
3. Try to change the titlescreen, in sprites/vicoscape.png
4. Remember the pic must be .png
5. i dont know anymore . . .

If you woldent mind, giving me a step by step help please i would really apricate it,

Please dont tell me to do this do that because im not a Java expert what so ever, if you would like to talk over msn add html3333@hotmail.com

Thankyou

Read full topic
